blocks.name: Innate Spellcasting
blocks.text:
[name]'s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC sdc[cha]). [name] can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: *druidcraft*
3/day each: *entangle*, *goodberry*
1/day each: *barkskin*, *pass without trace*, *shillelagh*

blocks.name: Magic Resistance
blocks.text: [name] has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

blocks.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
blocks.text: [name] can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

blocks.name: Tree Stride
blocks.text: Once on her turn, [name] can use 10 ft. of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 ft. of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the second tree. Both trees must be large or bigger.

blocks.name: Club
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit (atk[cha] to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: dmg[1d4] bludgeoning damage, or dmg[1d8 + cha] bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

blocks.name: Fey Charm
blocks.text:
[name] targets one humanoid or beast that she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see [name], it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed. The charmed creature regards [name] as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under [name]'s control, it takes [name]'s requests or actions in the most favorable way it can.
  Each time [name] or its allies do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until [name] dies, is on a different plane of existence from the target, or ends the effect as a bonus action. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to [name]'s Fey Charm for the next 24 hours.
  [name] can have no more than one humanoid and up to three beasts charmed at a time.

legendaryActions.description: [name] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. [name] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
